name: Game Jam 1 (Hannah)
description:
https://play.unity.com/mg/other/infinite-2d-shooter

My first game made for my first game jam going from 0 previous Unity experience. Extremely basic but I learned a lot about object movement and colliders!

While exploring a new world you are ambushed by a seemingly endless spawn of enemies! You might as well kill as many as you can before your inevitable death.. Controls are FORWARD: W, BACKWARD: S, Rotate Left: D, Rotate Right: A (Yes I know it is opposite but I kind of liked it that way.) All art taken from: https://opengameart.org/
